title: WeWork
summary: WeWork is an American commercial real estate company that provides flexible shared workspaces for technology startups and services for other enterprises. WeWork designs and builds physical and virtual[3] shared spaces and office services for entrepreneurs and companies.[4] Founded in 2010, its headquarters are in New York City.[5] As of 2018, WeWork managed over four million square metres.[6] WeWork's parent company was named The We Company, now WeWork.[7]
